definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: ferment, boil or foam up (Ar. xamara ferment, leaven, xumrah;un, xamiyrah;un n. leaven; v. Lag:BN 207);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[וְיַיִן ח]] Ps 75:9 and wine which foams, (others fr. IV. [[חמר]] be red); 3 pl. [[חָֽמְרוּ]] is suggested by We as poss. Hb Hab 3:15 (for MT [[חׂמֶר]] q.v.) the great waters foamed; Impf. 3 mpl. [[יֶחֱמוּ יֶחְמְרוּ מֵימָיו]] Ps 46:4 let its water roar and foam.

definitions.title: Pe‘ al‘ al
definitions.body: Pf. pass. 3 pl. [[מֵעַי חֳמַרְמָָרוּ]] La 1:20 my bowels are in a ferment (‖[[נֶהְפַּךְ לִבִּי]]), of distressat calamities of Jerus.; so [[חֳמַרְמְרוּ מֵעַי]] La 2:11.—Job 16:16 v. IV. [[חמר]].
